column3: sɛ ndzɛmba iyinom nyinara ba wo do
column6: na ekaakaa no wɔ amanaman nyinara mu mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn apam wo akɔ no
column9: nye wo mba san ba EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn
column11: na ɔnye wo kra nyinara tsie ne ndze na eyɛ dza merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara a;"

column2: "ɔno na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛdan wo ndɔmmumkɔ no
column4: na ɔasan aboa w'ano efi aman a ɔnoara EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn abɔ wo apetse mu no nyinara mu."

column2: "Sɛ wo nyimpa a wɔapam hɔn no bi wɔ ɔsor ano no ho mpo a
column3: ofitsi hɔ na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɔboa w'ano
column4: na hɔ na ɔbɛfa wo efi:"

column2: "na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze wo bɛba asaase a w'egyanom nyaa no do
column3: na aafa; na ɔbɛyɛ wo yie

column2: "Na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛma ɔwo nye w'asefo akoma
column4: na edze w'akoma nye wo kra nyinara

column2: "Na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze mpaa yi nyinara bogu w'atamfo
column3: nye hɔn a wokyir wo a wohiahia wo ho no do."

column4: na edzi ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛma yie ebu wo do wɔ wo nsaano edwuma nyinara mu
column3: wɔ wo honam mu aba mu
column6: wɔ wo yieyɛ ntsi: na EWURADZE n'enyi bɛsan agye wo ho wɔ wo yieyɛ ntsi
column7: dɛ mbrɛ n'enyi gyee w'egyanom ho no:"

column3: dɛ ibedzi ne mbransɛm nye n'ahyɛdze a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ mbra nwoma yi mu no do
column5: na ɔnye wo kra nyinara bɛsan aba EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn a."

column2: "Na mbrasɛm yi a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi

column4: Woana na ɔbɔfow akɔ sor ama hɛn
Woana na obotwa po ama hɛn

column3: ndɛ da yi medze nkwa nye papa

column2: "wɔ dɛ merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi dɛ dɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column4: na dzi ne mbransɛm nye n'ahyɛdze nye ne ntsɛmbu do
column6: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ehyira wo wɔ asaase a erokɔ do akɛfa no do."

column2: "mepaa mu meka kyerɛ hom ndɛ da yi
column3: dɛ ɔsɛɛ na hom bɛsɛɛ; na hom remma hom nda nnwar wɔ asaase mbrɛ irutwa Jordan akɔ do akɛfa no do."

column2: "Mefrɛ ɔsor nye asaase dɛ wondzi hom dase ndɛ da yi
column4: nhyira nye mpaa esi w'enyim: dɛm ntsi fa nkwa
na takyer no ho: na ɔno nye wo nkwa
column5: nye wo nda ne tsentsen: ama aatsena asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ w'egyanom
column8: nye Jakob dɛ ɔdze bɛma hɔn no do."
